snippet: The most significant part of the investigation appears to be more than 1,200 illegal phone calls by Baylor men’s and women’s basketball staff members.
abstract: Joy ride of Baylor's 2011-12 athletic season appears to have hit a speed bump, with the NCAA releasing a report that reveals violations in the university’s men’s and women’s basketball programs that are deemed 'major.'
lead_paragraph: The most significant part of the investigation appears to be more than 1,200 illegal phone calls by Baylor men’s and women’s basketball staff members.

headline.seo: N.C.A.A. Report Lists ‘Major’ Violations for Baylor Basketball
